greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of polynomials defined by Binet form: P(n,x) = (U^n-L^n)/(2d), where U=x+d, L=x-d, d=(x+4)^(1/2).
formula: Let Q(n,x) be the n-th polynomial at A162516; then
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 05 2009
